verbose_text: After screening various reaction conditions, we found that a mixture of LiN (SiMe 2 Ph) 2 and CeCl 3 in THF promoted the acetylide-aldehyde condensation to furnish diyne 150 with the C5-alpha-hydroxy group in a completely stereoselective fashion.
evidence: LiN(SiMe 2 Ph) 2  and CeCl 3  in THF promoted the acetylide-aldehyde condensation
